xwikidoc.name: How do I manage user access levels
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.tmarathe
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.tmarathe
xwikidoc.title: How do I manage access rights for a patient record

object.name: FAQ.How do I manage user access levels

property.answer:
You may modify access rights for a patient record for which you are an owner, or a collaborator with the necessary permission level. To manage access rights, navigate to the patient record and click on //Modify Permissions// (only visible if you have the required permission level). Here, you may:
* Transfer ownership of the record to another user (only if you are the owner, or an administrator) * Set the Global Visibility level for the record * Add or delete collaborators and collaborating groups for the record * Change the permission levels of collaborators and collaborating groups for the record
